about.summary: A little word cloud generator in Python

name: wordcloud
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}

package:
    name: wordcloud
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    url: https://github.com/amueller/word_cloud/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
    fn: wordcloud-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 936266403526943c8649bdc9bc6167e8c7eaba12e56f8ab286d1920617cef44e

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - toolchain

    run:
        - python
        - pillow
        - numpy

test:
    imports:
        - wordcloud
    commands:
        - wordcloud_cli.py -h

about:
    home: https://github.com/amueller/word_cloud
    license: MIT
    summary: A little word cloud generator in Python

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - amueller
        - ericdill
